title: For Sale: T206 SGC50 - Griffith Portrait - LAST PRICE DROP BEFORE EBAY (11/17)
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: For Sale: T206 SGC50 - Griffith Portrait - LAST PRICE DROP BEFORE EBAY (11/17)
posts.post_content:
Prices include delivery, although I would entertain trades for SGC40 T206s.  I prefer standard paypal payments.  The player's name is a link to a page with a photo.  On the page is a way to download a larger image if needed.

PLEASE NOTE: all cards marked with an asterisk (*) were soaked in tap water to remove paper or tape.
